channel.title: «pi» need help - if you get this solved you will be rewarded
channel.description:
So basically my mate made a PI server, and for the first couple of days he used Hamachi for everyone to play. Then later on he moved to a portforwarded server, (no-ip) and i get this error when-ever i run my client:
[img]http://oi44.tinypic.com/72d0kg.jpg[/img]
If anyone could help me so i can log-in again, he WILL get rewarded with cash. Add me on msn if u can help me or post a comment below:
taurushelp@live.be

item.title: «pi» need help - if you get this solved you will be rewarded
item.dc:creator: @Zentior Zentior
item.description:
@Zentior wrote:

RiiPiiNFtW:

Your main class should be client if I am not mistaken. Right click the client, click edit and change JFrame to client

What exactly does that mean? :.

Read full topic

item.title: «pi» need help - if you get this solved you will be rewarded
item.dc:creator: @kingcobra805 kingcobra805
item.description:
@kingcobra805 wrote:

i do beleive it is saying it cannot find "Main Class: JFrame

in otherwords it cannot locate it. could be something to do with paths or something who knows honestly.
i’ve had them errors before and they suck lol

Read full topic

item.title: «pi» need help - if you get this solved you will be rewarded
item.dc:creator: @Zentior Zentior
item.description:
@Zentior wrote:

Butchd12:

theres something missing in the client, the Jframe is missing, you might need to re download the client or update the cache

I got the jframe in my client, and ive redownloaded the client literally about 7 times. And how exactly do i update the cache?

Delete your JFrame.class and recompile.

Did it, doesn’t help. :\

Read full topic
